title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that tips shall not be subject to income or employment taxes.
content: Tax Free Tips Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt tips from the income tax, social security and railroad retirement taxes, unemployment taxes, and tax withholding. Defines tips as any gratuity provided to a salaried employee by a customer or client of the employer's business.
